subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Mike Buck kicked a 36-yard field goal in overtime as Colgate, riding Jordan Scott’s 211 yards and 3 touchdowns, stormed back from a 28-0 deficit to defeat host Dartmouth, 31-28, in overtime.
snippet: Mike Buck kicked a 36-yard field goal in overtime as Colgate, riding Jordan Scott’s 211 yards and 3 touchdowns, stormed back from a 28-0 deficit to defeat host Dartmouth, 31-28, in overtime.
